description: The project will strengthen institutional and community capacities to adapt to climate change-driven events that systematically increase the vulnerability of island communities.

subproject.description: The project will increase the protection of livelihoods in island communities from dynamic climate-related damage in all islands based on institutional strengthening, policies, demonstration activities and knowledege management.
subproject.title: Tuvalu NAPA-I

subproject.description: The project will increase the protection of livelihoods in island communities from dynamic climate-related damage in all islands based on institutional strengthening, policies, demonstration activities and knowledege management.
subproject.title: Tuvalu NAPA-I

subproject.description: Increasing Resilience of Coastal Areas and Community Settlements to Climate Change in Tuvalu
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Tuvalu NAPA 1

title: TUVALU National Adaptation Programme of Action (NAPA)
